product.title: Remington Pro 1" Multi-Styler with Twist & Curl Technology, Color Care Protection , Champagne/Gray, S16A10
product.description: Twist & Curl Technology - Easy, long-lasting results! The twisted plates include micro guide combs that secure hair onto the plate to prevent it from slipping while you twist and curl.1” Twisted Plates - The unique plates feature a round design that guides and cools hair to set lasting curls, beach waves, or smooth, straight styles.Heat Control Sensor - Protect hair from damage and color fading! The sensor automatically adjusts the temperature to prevent overheating. This sensor can be shut off.Ceramic Titanium Plates - The Ceramic Titanium plates offer fast, even heat, and a smooth glide while styling.450°F Salon High Heat - The salon high heat helps set styles fast.Cool Tip - The tip of the styler stays cool, and it’s designed for easy gripping.Smooth, Round Design - The round exterior of the styler guides curling and instantly cools hair to set long-lasting curls.Auto Shut Off - A 60 minute auto shut off feature lets you operate the flat iron with peace of mind every time.
product.description_html:
• Twist & Curl Technology - Easy, long-lasting results! The twisted plates include micro guide combs that secure hair onto the plate to prevent it from slipping while you twist and curl.
  • 1” Twisted Plates - The unique plates feature a round design that guides and cools hair to set lasting curls, beach waves, or smooth, straight styles.
  • Heat Control Sensor - Protect hair from damage and color fading! The sensor automatically adjusts the temperature to prevent overheating. This sensor can be shut off.
  • Ceramic Titanium Plates - The Ceramic Titanium plates offer fast, even heat, and a smooth glide while styling.
  • 450°F Salon High Heat - The salon high heat helps set styles fast.
  • Cool Tip - The tip of the styler stays cool, and it’s designed for easy gripping.
  • Smooth, Round Design - The round exterior of the styler guides curling and instantly cools hair to set long-lasting curls.
  • Auto Shut Off - A 60 minute auto shut off feature lets you operate the flat iron with peace of mind every time.
product.description_full:
Twist & Curl Technology - Easy, long-lasting results! The twisted plates include micro guide combs that secure hair onto the plate to prevent it from slipping while you twist and curl.1” Twisted Plates - The unique plates feature a round design that guides and cools hair to set lasting curls, beach waves, or smooth, straight styles.Heat Control Sensor - Protect hair from damage and color fading! The sensor automatically adjusts the temperature to prevent overheating. This sensor can be shut off.Ceramic Titanium Plates - The Ceramic Titanium plates offer fast, even heat, and a smooth glide while styling.450°F Salon High Heat - The salon high heat helps set styles fast.Cool Tip - The tip of the styler stays cool, and it’s designed for easy gripping.Smooth, Round Design - The round exterior of the styler guides curling and instantly cools hair to set long-lasting curls.Auto Shut Off - A 60 minute auto shut off feature lets you operate the flat iron with peace of mind every time. BOUNCY CURLS, BEACH WAVES, AND SMOOTH STRAIGHT STYLES WITH ONE TOOL! 
 REMINGTON PRO 1" MULTI-STYLER WITH TWIST & CURL TECHNOLOGY 
Straighten or curl using just one tool! The REMINGTON® Pro 1" Multi-Styler with Twist & Curl Technology features unique twisted plates that guide hair to set bouncy curls, beach waves, or straight styles. 

Micro guide combs along the edge of the plates prevent hair from slipping during the twist, and the rounded housing cools hair instantly to set long-lasting curls. 

It’s perfect for color treated hair thanks to the Heat Control Sensor, which prevents overheating for less damage and color fading*. 

The Ceramic Titanium plates heat up fast to create a smooth glide. Find the heat you prefer for your hair type with easy-to-use digital controls and a range of five heat settings from 300°F to 450°F.

*damage to color vs. standard Remington straightener
product.description_full_html:
• Twist & Curl Technology - Easy, long-lasting results! The twisted plates include micro guide combs that secure hair onto the plate to prevent it from slipping while you twist and curl.
  • 1” Twisted Plates - The unique plates feature a round design that guides and cools hair to set lasting curls, beach waves, or smooth, straight styles.
  • Heat Control Sensor - Protect hair from damage and color fading! The sensor automatically adjusts the temperature to prevent overheating. This sensor can be shut off.
  • Ceramic Titanium Plates - The Ceramic Titanium plates offer fast, even heat, and a smooth glide while styling.
  • 450°F Salon High Heat - The salon high heat helps set styles fast.
  • Cool Tip - The tip of the styler stays cool, and it’s designed for easy gripping.
  • Smooth, Round Design - The round exterior of the styler guides curling and instantly cools hair to set long-lasting curls.
  • Auto Shut Off - A 60 minute auto shut off feature lets you operate the flat iron with peace of mind every time.

    • Bouncy Curls, Beach Waves, and Smooth Straight Styles with One Tool!

    REMINGTON Pro 1" Multi-Styler with Twist & Curl Technology

    Straighten or curl using just one tool! The REMINGTON® Pro 1" Multi-Styler with Twist & Curl Technology features unique twisted plates that guide hair to set bouncy curls, beach waves, or straight styles.

    Micro guide combs along the edge of the plates prevent hair from slipping during the twist, and the rounded housing cools hair instantly to set long-lasting curls.

    It’s perfect for color treated hair thanks to the Heat Control Sensor, which prevents overheating for less damage and color fading*.

    The Ceramic Titanium plates heat up fast to create a smooth glide. Find the heat you prefer for your hair type with easy-to-use digital controls and a range of five heat settings from 300°F to 450°F.

    *damage to color vs. standard Remington straightener

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
